welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Plainview, Philippines! Known for its breathtaking landscapes and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in the city's charm and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is the newest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, exclusively serving international and domestic flights of Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights of various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout all terminals at Ninoy Aquino International Airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
